title: PM asks Interior Ministry to expedite tabling Anti-Torture Bill in NA
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 03 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Thursday terming torture “unacceptable in a civilized society” asked the Interior Ministry to expedite tabling of Anti-Torture Bill in the National Assembly.
Prime Minister @ImranKhanPTI tweeted that he has asked the Ministry of Interior to expedite tabling of the Anti-Torture Bill in the @NAofPakistan. pic.twitter.com/us6SSlyon2
— Prime Minister's Office, Pakistan (@PakPMO) September 3, 2020
“Torture is unacceptable in a civilised democratic society and goes against the spirit of Islam, our constitution and our international legal commitments,” the Prime Minister tweeted.
